[DQC.US.0116.9726] The company has reported a value of 300,000 for the concept us-gaap:BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityTransactionCosts. It is expected that this fact uses the BusinessAcquisitionAxis and not the AssetAcquisitionAxis as asset acquisitions should not use the element BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityTransactionCosts. Consider changing the axis used with this fact to the BusinessAcquisitionAxis.
The properties of this us-gaap:BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityTransactionCosts fact are: Period :2021-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:AssetAcquisitionAxis=chct:AcquisitionOfPropertiesDuring1stQuarter2021Member Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9726 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1631569/000163156921000041/chct-20210630.htm 4
